messages.subject: OPRAH AND HSING TODAY???
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks to a query I received I went to the Oprah website.  It says today s Oprah is Letters to Oprah Live so hsing s moment of glory may be at hand!!! The
messages.messageBody:
Thanks to a query I received I went to the Oprah website. It says
today's Oprah is "Letters to Oprah Live" so hsing's moment of glory may
be at hand!!!

The site, however, did not mention hsing specifically. Thought it
better to be safe than sorry - PLEASE share the word with your other
lists...I'll be doing my best from this end!

It has been shared with several people that this coverage is in response
to a deluge of letters the show received, as well as recommendations
from Oprah's studio audience. Some at NHEN have discussed that no
matter what type of job Oprah does with the topic - good, bad, or
indifferent - it would behoove us to send another deluge of letters!
Rumor has it that Oprah didn't know anything about homeschooling prior
to letters and recommendations -- maybe if she sees us rally again it
could lead to further coverage as she seems to have a soft spot for
education in general.

The website address is www.oprah.com.

Best,
Linda
